title: How can I get an S+ with support?
body:
I've went 2/4/30 with Morgana support but I only ended up getting an A+

How can I get an S+ with Morgana/Janna?

replies.body:
Kill participation is a big factor a lot of people overlook. Your kill participation for that game was only 53%. Up near 70%+ you are FAR more likely to net an S.

Of course, if everything is happening top lane in the early game getting that participation up is hard, and deaths are a little too punishing for supports, it is why they have talked about re-tuning the mastery grades for supports. 

All in all it's about more than KDA. It's about warding, it's about objectives, it's about participation and teamwork.

Don't die. Literally. The only way to do it is not die and have a blinder.
I watched Aphromoo stream to try and get S for his champ mastery. He basically worked out if you die more than twice you can't get higher than S- and you need 2-3 kills too.

I got my S on Morg from this game: http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/124934900/200743579?tab=overview

I went 4-1-23. Placed most wards in the game and did more damage then my jungler.

Just take kills and you will get an S+

Even pros have realized that the system is fucked that way, though riot have said that it will be modified to not be based off kills so much in a coming patch
[See this Thread that was made about 5 minutes after yours](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/IPsAwwzl-how-are-support-graded)

the ranking system isn't solely judged by what your KDA is try dropping wards more often take jg creeps (especially easy with morg) other than that shield as much as you can to get those assists and of course as always try to avoid needless deaths take some turrets or inhibs if the opportunity arises otherwise keep up the good work 

P.S
the more you do in a game the higher your rank so = your teams stats ~ your stats (some random calculations here) = D to S+
Use the search bar, type in S+ or mastery and the answers should be in there.
